transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Good morning sir, Ajay baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aapka sir IndiaMART pe miss call aaya tha. Kuch issue tha kya service se related?
Customer: Ji. Sir wo Hayashi abhi tak update nahi hua hai.
Executive: Hayashi matlab kya cheez?
Customer: Hayashi Wooden Works.
Executive: Accha product ka?
Customer: Product ka nahi sir wo activate hi nahi hui hai.
Executive: Ek baar dekh leta hu.
Executive: Kab aapne diya tha ye?
Customer: Isko to kafi time ho gaya mere hisab se 15 din ho jane chahiye. Diwali ke baad diya tha. Diwali 25-26 me karaya tha shayad maine.
Executive: Pura naam kya hai iska Hayashi?
Customer: Hayashi Wooden Works Private Limited.
Executive: Ye company ka naam bata rahe hain ya fir product ka naam bata rahe hain sir?
Customer: Company ka naam bata raha hu. Company activate nahi hui hai abhi.
Executive: To aapka to ye glass wood handicraft hai na?
Customer: Nahi mera ye bhi hai aur wo bhi hai. Maine to ke liye phone kiya tha aapko, Hayashi ke liye.
Executive: Ek second Hayashi. Aap hi manager ho na Hayashi ke?
Customer: Nahi nahi Hayashi ke to main manager nahi hu. Main aapka ye glass wood handicraft ka hu.
Executive: Accha accha accha accha chaliye thik hai.
Executive: Uska primary number batayenge kya?
Customer: 7417
Executive: 7417 isme wo Hayashi me jo de rakha hai jo de rakha hai aapne.
Customer: Ji ji wahi hai ye. 7417428020.
Executive: 8020

Executive: 741 17428020
Executive: Abhi to nahi activate hua hai sir.
Customer: Sir ye to wo kaise jin kuch bataye hume kaise activate hoga iska manager ka bhi nahi pata chal raha hume kaun iska manager.
Executive: Aapne kisko, kiske through link hoke payment kiya tha?
Customer: Juhi, Juhi Saxena.
Executive: Juhi Saxena ke through aapne plan kiya tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Hayashi naam se pata nahi aa nahi raha hai aur aapka ye number 74
Customer: 7417
Executive: 74
Customer: 17
Executive: 1742
Customer: 42
Executive: 8020
Customer: 8020 ye wala number aa nahi raha hai sir ye. Koi aur number to nahi diya tha na aapne?
Customer: Nahi sir yahi number hai ek minute dekh leta hu.
Executive: 8020 isme to
Executive: Thik hai aapko main 5 minute me aapko ye call back karta hu, thik hai. Main inse ek baar discuss kar leta hu Juhi Saxena se kaun sa hai.
Customer: Haa.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's Hayashi account not yet activated.

- Wants to know the manager for Hayashi account.



Resolution:

- Executive took customer's number to check.

- Executive will call back in 5 minutes.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after checking with Juhi Saxena.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- activation, account, follow up
